channel.title: 667/711 Need help setting npc direction

item.title: 667/711 Need help setting npc direction
item.dc:creator: @walzo walzo
item.description:
@walzo wrote:

Hi I’m use viacomX 667/711 and when i try to set the direction of an npc with setdirection() it doesn’t work but it dose when it’s used on a player.

Here is my npc spawning code

public static final void spawnNPCE(int id, WorldTile tile, int dir, boolean canWalk) { NPC n = new NPC(id, tile, -1, false,true); n.setRandomWalk(canWalk); n.setDirection(dir); }

Read full topic
